name: Nightmare's Haunt: A Dweller's Empty Path Horror Hack!
name_original: Nightmare's Haunt: A Dweller's Empty Path Horror Hack!
description:
Do you ever wish you were married to a dead guy? Like, not that your husband was dead. Or that, you want to be in love with a man. I don't know your preferences... But what if your preferences were.... ghosts? Which, are.... dead people? How scary (I'm scared)! 

Or perhaps you consider yourself.... too spooked to poop? If so, that's a serious medical condition and you should see a doctor as soon as possible. 

But if in the off chance that you're constipated in a hospital and have nothing better to do (except perhaps to marry a ghost), you should play this game hack, NIGHTMARE'S HAUNT! It's a horror parody hack of Temmie Chang's Dweller's Empty Path! If you haven't played that game, you should! But if you don't want to play Dweller's because you hate fun and free software, then you can still play this hack without it!

If you want to learn more, HERE'S A TRAILER:

If you like this game, check out my other hacks of Temmie Chang's works: Captured Canyon and Yoki's Revenge!

Download Nightmare's Haunt below for PC and MAC:
